text: jisane allaah ke saath kufr kiya, apane eemaan laane ke pashchaat, parantu jo baadhy kar diya gaya ho, is dasha mein ki usaka dil eemaan se santusht ho, (usake lie kshama hai). parantu jisane kufr ke saath seena khol diya[1] ho, to unheen par allaah ka prakop hai aur unheen ke lie maha yaatana hai
